mapper.sql: id AS "id", material_type_id AS "materialTypeId", material_type AS "materialType", material_name AS "materialName", material_sku AS "materialSku", m_batch AS "mBatch", m_unit AS "mUnit", min_package_size AS "minPackageSize", storage_state AS "storageState", storage_address AS "storageAddress", data_state AS "dataState", create_time AS "createTime"
mapper.select:
select
from wms_material_spare_parts where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and material_type_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialTypeId},'%')
and material_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialType},'%')
and material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and m_batch like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mBatch},'%')
and m_unit like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mUnit},'%')
and min_package_size like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.minPackageSize},'%')
and storage_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.storageState},'%')
and storage_address like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.storageAddress},'%')
and data_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.dataState},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
